About ShortForge

We're a team of AI researchers, engineers, and business strategists passionate about democratizing cutting-edge technology. Our mission is to help businesses harness the power of AI and automation to achieve unprecedented efficiency and growth.

5+
Years of Experience
25+
Team Members
1,000+
Projects Delivered
98%
Client Satisfaction

Our Mission

To empower businesses of all sizes with intelligent automation and AI solutions that drive efficiency, innovation, and sustainable growth. We believe technology should work for you, not the other way around.

Our Vision

A world where every business, regardless of size or industry, can leverage the power of AI and automation to solve complex problems, create new opportunities, and achieve their full potential.

Our Values

The principles that guide everything we do and shape our culture as a company.

Excellence

We strive for perfection in every solution we deliver, ensuring the highest quality standards.

Client-Centric

Your success is our success. We build long-term partnerships based on trust and results.

Innovation

We stay at the forefront of technology, continuously exploring new ways to solve problems.

Security

Data protection and privacy are paramount in everything we do.

Collaboration

We believe in the power of teamwork, both within our company and with our clients.

Impact

We measure our success by the positive impact we create for our clients and society.

Our Journey

From humble beginnings to industry leaders, here's how we've grown and evolved.

19
2019

Company Founded

ShortForge was established with a vision to democratize AI and automation technologies.

20
2020

First AI Agent Deployment

Successfully deployed our first enterprise-grade AI agent for a Fortune 500 company.

21
2021

Series A Funding

Raised $5M to accelerate development of our automation platform.

22
2022

Global Expansion

Opened offices in London and Singapore, serving clients worldwide.

23
2023

Industry Recognition

Named one of the top 10 AI companies by TechCrunch and Gartner.

24
2024

1,000+ Projects Completed

Reached a milestone of over 1,000 successful project deliveries.
